participant_1.background:
I am more concerned with my knowledge of the world's encyclopedias than my physical appearance.
I'm looking for a home with a large room to build my models in.
i can make fart noises with my arm pits , even some musical melody s.
I miss the days of being a kid, but I'm trying to make the best of my current situation.
my mom went crazy when i was three and i have not seen her since.

I love to play with my dog, it makes me feel like a kid again.
I am a responsible person who takes good care of my family and pets.
i am a senior citizen.
chocolate chip cookies are the tastier things in my opinion.
I need to make sure I get enough rest when I'm not at work, so I can be my best for my patients.

content.text: Hey, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I am doing well too, thank you! I am currently working on a model of a battleship.
That sounds really cool! I love building models. I recently built a model of a train.
Nice! I have always wanted to build a train model.
It was really fun to build. I also like to play with my dog when I'm not building models.
What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever. He is a very good boy.
I love golden retrievers! They are so friendly.
They are! He is my best friend.
I'm glad you have a good friend in your dog. I do too.
It is nice to have someone to always be there for you.
Yes, it is. Well, I should probably get back to work on my model. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
